commit message: Fix broken F-Droid badge link

Add highscore text if the game was won

This commit adds a highscore text if the game was won. If the game was
won for the first time or a new highscore is reached, it will display a
text congratulating the player. Otherwise it wil display the users
personal best. The highscores are saved separately for every game
mode (combination of number of colors and board size).

Merge pull request #17 from raatmarien/master

Add highscore text if the game was won

Rework high score system

High score related functions have been moved from EndGameActivity
to HighScoreManager, a new class. A separate TextView has also been
created in EndGameActivity to display the high score related text.
at the end of a game.
